name: Meditation Journey
text:
Meditate (Put an orb counter on a Chi you control. If you don’t control one, first create a Chi enchantment token with "{1}, Sacrifice this: Copy target instant or sorcery spell you control with mana value less than or equal to the number of orb counters on this. You may choose new targets for the copy.")

Exile target creature you control. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner’s control at the beginning of your next upkeep with a +1/+1 counter on it.
